content: this pattern is a great project for beginner to advanced to complete and takes less than 2 hours from start to finish it will make a great quick gift or make one as an accessory to a favorite outfit united states crochet terminology any type of fiber may be used for this project from fingering to worsted results will vary depending on the type of fiber selected the original cowl was made using crystal palace yarns moonshine which is a worsted weight fiber my moonlight wrap which is the top featured photo for this design was made using a fingering weight fiber and a smaller j hook you can see my project notes here moonlight wrap 1 stitches used chain single_crochet double_crochet crossed double_crochet this link explains the crossed double_crochet stitch exactly as i intend the stitch in this pattern to be completed crossed double_crochet tutorial 2 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/merripurdy/moonlight-serenade-3 2 http //crochet about com/library/blcrosseddc htm
